title: Calories in KFC Pot Pie
meta_description: Learn calories in KFC pot pie, with a full breakdown of macros like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: KFC's standard Chicken Pot Pie (8 oz serving), including flaky crust, chicken, vegetables, and gravy; values based on official KFC nutrition data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and customizations. Check KFC's official app or site for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One KFC pot pie has 720 calories, 27 g protein, and 39 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one KFC pot pie?
faqs.a: Approximately 720 calories per standard Chicken Pot Pie.

faqs.q: What's the protein in KFC pot pie?
faqs.a: About 27 g of protein from chicken and filling.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in KFC pot pie?
faqs.a: Around 1860 mg, mostly from gravy and seasoning.

faqs.q: Are carbs high in KFC pot pie?
faqs.a: Yes, 72 g total, mainly from the crust and veggies.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie KFC pot pie?
faqs.a: Opt for half portion or tweaks like less crust to reduce calories by 100-200.
